A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of people are unhappy with some of the questionable plot points of the movie. I wish there would have been more background information provided\, but overall the film was still amazing. In the trailer Luke says \"this is not going to go the way that you expect\"\, and he was right. Lots of twists and turns\, and an awesome closing sequence. 10/10 would recommend.
